p: Comparatively in 2020, there was almost 50% reduction with significant difference ( P<0.001) in total number of reported measles cases as compared to 2019. During the first quarter of 2020 (January, n = 459), (February, n = 652) and (March, n = 846), the reported number of measles cases were higher than in 2019 (January n = 245), (February n = 326) and (March n = 663).
